Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you from one end to another thanks to alot of incredible work mostly from writers and technicians.

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy share their excess food (authentic Bubblegum with enough sugar to rot teeth) or ways to get food for those who need it... dishwashers are essential & so the rich LOVE infuse them. Did you know that bubble gum revenues affected an entire economy? Escalation Dev

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to be sure love it or hate it, has some funny moments specially the bad dubbing for one and if you like Ninjo films you will really enjoy this one because is acted like a biggest spoof of itself.
